languages.text: "Почему ты думаешь, что роман может повредить нашим рабочим отношениям?"
"What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"
languages.original_text: "Почему ты думаешь, что роман может повредить нашим рабочим отношениям?"

traits.locale_text: "What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"
"What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"
"What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"
"What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"
"What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"

languages.text: "Wieso denkt Ihr, eine Affäre würde unser Arbeitsverhältnis beeinträchtigen?"
languages.original_text: "What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"

traits.locale_text: "Wieso denkt Ihr, eine Affäre würde unser Arbeitsverhältnis beeinträchtigen?"

languages.text: « Qu'est-ce qui vous fait croire qu'une liaison pourrait nuire à notre relation professionnelle ? »
languages.original_text: "What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"

traits.locale_text: « Qu'est-ce qui vous fait croire qu'une liaison pourrait nuire à notre relation professionnelle ? »

languages.text: 「関係を持つことが、{mf|俺|私}たちの仕事上の関係に悪影響を及ぼすと思うのはなぜだ？」
languages.original_text: "What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"

traits.locale_text: 「関係を持つことが、{mf|俺|私}たちの仕事上の関係に悪影響を及ぼすと思うのはなぜだ？」

languages.text: «¿Qué le hace pensar que una relación sentimental afectaría a la profesional?».
languages.original_text: "What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué le hace pensar que una relación sentimental afectaría a la profesional?».

languages.text: “你为什么觉得我们之间的感情会影响工作关系？”
languages.original_text: "What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"

traits.locale_text: “你为什么觉得我们之间的感情会影响工作关系？”

languages.original_text: "What makes you think an affair would harm our working relationship?"
